name: Velora Luxe Armchair
description: A plush, velvet-upholstered armchair with deep cushioning and a modern silhouette, perfect for adding a touch of luxury to any living space.

name: HavenCraft Lounge Chair
description: Crafted with a solid wooden frame and breathable fabric, this chair combines style and comfort, making it ideal for cozy reading corners.

name: Briarwood Comfort Chair
description: Featuring a sturdy oak frame and extra-wide cushions, this armchair offers unmatched relaxation for movie nights or afternoon naps.

name: Serenity Swivel Seat
description: A sleek, rotating armchair with ergonomic support and a minimalist design, perfect for home offices or modern lounge areas.

name: Crestwood Classic Armchair
description: A timeless armchair with rolled arms, button-tufted detailing, and rich leather upholstery, bringing elegance to both traditional and contemporary interiors.

name: The Haven Chair
description: A plush retreat for your living space, The Haven Chair combines deep cushioning with soft fabric to create the ultimate relaxation spot. Perfect for evenings with a book or quiet coffee mornings.

name: The Regent Armchair
description: Majestic yet inviting, The Regent boasts refined lines, a high backrest, and elegant armrests. Upholstered in premium fabric, it offers both style and posture support for modern and traditional interiors.

name: Cloud Nine Lounger
description: Sink in and float away—Cloud Nine’s ultra-soft cushioning and oversized seat make it feel like sitting on a fluffy embrace. Ideal for lazy Sundays and binge-watching marathons.

name: The Ember Chair
description: With warm tones and cozy padding, The Ember adds a welcoming glow to any room. Its sturdy frame and gentle curves promise both durability and everyday comfort.

name: Atlas Armchair
description: Built for presence, the Atlas features bold proportions, structured upholstery, and a solid base—making it a striking statement piece that anchors your space.

name: The Serene Sofa
description: A soft, inviting centerpiece designed for pure relaxation. The Serene Sofa features plush cushions, a low profile, and breathable upholstery—perfect for creating a calm, welcoming atmosphere.

name: Horizon Modular Sofa
description: A versatile seating solution for any space. With its modular design, the Horizon adapts to your lifestyle—whether you’re hosting guests or enjoying a quiet evening.

name: The Loft Lounge
description: Modern and sleek, The Loft combines clean lines with deep seating for a minimalist yet cozy vibe. Ideal for contemporary homes with a love for style and comfort.

name: Cloudrest Sectional
description: Sink into the Cloudrest’s oversized cushions and soft-touch fabric. Its spacious design is perfect for families, movie nights, or anyone who loves stretching out in comfort.

name: Solace Two-Seater
description: Compact yet luxurious, the Solace offers exceptional comfort in a space-friendly size. Great for apartments, reading corners, or intimate living areas.
